game.name: Ambrosia
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The apprentice priestess Flode is dedicated to serving the God of Light, Leight, but when she's suddenly wrapped up in a scandal, she's sent to a remote island to spread the faith. Little does everyone know, the island houses long-forgotten secrets of its own...
game.shortDescriptionEn: The apprentice priestess Flode is dedicated to serving the God of Light, Leight, but when she's suddenly wrapped up in a scandal, she's sent to a remote island to spread the faith. Little does everyone know, the island houses long-forgotten secrets of its own...

reviewHighlights.text: 야 7/10 겜 7/10 요약: cg 다 직접 찾아야하는것 뺴고는 양호하다 생각됨. 살만하다
